Title: Pizzaburgers
Body:
This is a page about Pizzaburgers, but conveniently also demos how easy it is to add pages with custom url paths to this project. To add another page like this: 

- Go to the [admin panel](http://localhost:1337/admin)
- Select Pages in the sidebar
- Click the **Add new Page** button
- Fill out the fields and click Save
- View the page, which can now be found at the url path you set for it

~~linebreak~~

In any case, this page was actually about pizzaburgers - the ideal food for hackathons. It takes just under 2 minutes to microwave yourself one, and it'll keep you fed for the whole weekend. 

#### They come in various flavours:

- Pineapple
- Salami
- Quattro Formaggi
- BBQ
- Chipotle **WARNING: Extra spicy** 

If you're interested in reading more, please see all of the available flavours [here](https://google.com)
